about_the_game:
In this game, you will become the manager of a motel, and your task will be to create, renovate, and grow your business to attract numerous guests.
Design the interiors of your motel. Choose styles, color schemes, and decorations to create a unique atmosphere in each room and common areas. Bring your creative ideas to life to attract and impress guests.

Apply your entrepreneurial skills to develop your motel into a profitable business. Set room prices, control expenses, and optimize your revenues. Attract guests through marketing campaigns and provide top-notch service.

Swift success will lead to increased demand for rooms. Consider expanding the building, adding new floors, or constructing additional facilities like restaurants or spa centers to attract even more customers.

Pay attention to every visitor, from families and tourists to business travelers – each guest will have their own preferences and requirements. Fulfill their requests and offer various services to keep your hotel successful and popular.

Be a wise financial manager and monitor the hotel's budget. Make decisions to maximize profits, invest in expansion or improvements, and be prepared for economic challenges that may arise during your business's growth.
Compete with other motels in the area and become the most attractive choice for guests. Evolve, listen to feedback, and compare your success with competitors.

Motel Simulator: Create, Renovate & Grow Business offers you the opportunity to become a professional in hotel management. Create, improve, and thrive to establish the most sought-after and impressive motel in the region!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Motel Simulator is a game that allows you to become the manager of your own motel! Decorate the interior, rent out rooms, expand, and collect profits. Develop marketing strategies to attract diverse guests. Fulfill their requests and offer various services to keep your motel successful and popular.
